author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA'S CORE NOW EAST-NORTHEAST OF BERMUDA WITH CONDITIONS ON THE ISLAND EXPECTED TO IMPROVE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS...
summary: ...IMELDA'S CORE NOW EAST-NORTHEAST OF BERMUDA WITH CONDITIONS ON THE ISLAND EXPECTED TO IMPROVE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS... As of 2:00 AM AST Thu Oct 02 the center of Imelda was located near 32.6, -63.5 with movement ENE at 30 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
